title: Cite-Check a Legal Brief
description: A junior paralegal must cite-check a brief before it is filed, ensuring all case citations are in the correct format (e.g., Bluebook) and accurately state the cited proposition.

tasks.description: Extract all legal citations from the draft brief.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of all case and statute citations.

tasks.description: For each citation, check that it is formatted correctly according to the specified style guide (e.g., Bluebook).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies and corrects any formatting errors.

tasks.description: For each citation, pull up the cited source and verify that it stands for the legal proposition it is being cited for in the brief.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the accuracy of all legal arguments.
